short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalist stendig calander new tab page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple, stendig inspired new tab page designed for your minimalist tastes.

FEATURES
• Fully functional stendig-design calendar
• Time, year & month
• Customizable current-day colour
• Noir theme
• New-tab animation options

ABOUT
Originally designed in 1966 by Massimo Vignelli, the stendig calendar is a classic and iconic masterpiece.

I created this extension to fulfill my need for a minimalist new-tab calendar, and I hope it fulfills your need too. For any suggestions or issues, please comment on this extension's page, and hope you have a great day.
